# Wave of Grief (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Blackguard Spells|Blackguard 2]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (three tears)

**Range:** 30 ft.

**Area:** Cone-shaped burst

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 236

*Emitting a mournful wail, you send out a pulse of magic imbued with sorrow and sadness.*

All within the cone when the spell is cast take a â€“3 penalty on attack rolls, saving throws, ability checks, and skill checks.
